verses.refrain: Furaha wataipata, furaha hata milele, Furaha, wataipata, wakati wa mavuno.
verses.verse: Wavunaji watafurahi, pale wataporudi, Wakiyaleta mavuno hata Yerusalemu.
Na siku ile tutaimba, kumshukuru na kumsifu Bwana Yesu jumbe wetu, kule Yerusalemu.
Wavunaji watafurahi makaoni mwa milele Yaliyowekwa tayari kule Yerusalemu.
